author: SeeminglyScience
body:
Under "Engine Updates and Fixes"

> Enable indexing operations on System.Tuple and System.ValueTuple (#7633) (Thanks @SeeminglyScience!)
> Enable indexing operations on objects that implement ITuple (#7633) (Thanks @SeeminglyScience!)

Both of these lines refer to the same PR, and the change was already included in 6.1 GA.
title: Release notes for 6.2 preview 1 has duplicate attribution
